DataElement.preferredName: Person Last Therapeutic Procedure Recovery Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether a person has recovered, a healing process and/or an outcome implying relative health, following an action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process as an element of a personal medical history which is necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Last Therapeutic Procedure Recovery Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a person having recovered, a healing process and/or an outcome implying relative health, following an action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process as an element of a personal medical history which is necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Property.preferredName: Last Therapeutic Procedure Recovery Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.:gradual healing (through rest) after sickness or injury.:Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
A healing process and/or an outcome implying relative health.  The term is typically used in the context of direct and indirect effects of sickness or injury.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has the patient recovered fro
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient recovered from the effects of recent surgery, radiotherapy or chemotherapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient recovered from the effects of recent surgery, radiotherapy, or chemotherapy to baseline or CTCAE <= grade 1 toxicity from all prior therapies except alopecia and other non-clinically significant AE's?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient recovered from the effects of recent surgery?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient recovered from the effects of recent surgery, radiotherapy or other therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient recovered from the adverse effects of recent surgery, radiotherapy or chemotherapy?

DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Assessments Ind-2 2018320v1.0 with VD ID#3506068 - Yes No Indicator - dbw
